card.name: SW - Person Property History linked search

data.text: @gillianoberholzer I cannot guess if I should put in a ' character or not. This is coming from LightStone as is. What we can do though is @yasserogier can cater for the ' character on the Lookup procedure. If they verify the township before searching it will find the proper one. @yasserogier, please remove the ' character when comparing in the Lookup_Township sproc.
